title: Fort Vancouver National Historic Site: Virtual Tour
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Virtual Tour              The Fort Vancouver Virtual Reality Project          Â    In the spring of 2016, middle school students from Vancouver's iTech Preparatory, under the direction of social studies teachers John Zingale and David Midkiff, and with help from the national park's archaeologists and curators, created a series of interactive virtual tours of the reconstructed Fort Vancouver. These tours take virtual visitors through many buildings inside the fort walls, as well as into historic landscapes around the fort.  Click here to access the Fort Vancouver Virtual Reality (FVvr) tour!
